casebody.data:
Charles A. C. FAIMAN, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 12542. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. March 20, 1950. James H. Martin,. Dallas, Tex., T. F. Monroe, Dallas, Tex., for appellant. William Cantrell, Jr., Asst. U. S. Atty., Dallas, Tex., for appellee.

Before HOLMES, McCORD, and BORAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
